Question: This person's second book, The French Chef Cookbook, was a collection of the recipes she had demonstrated on the show.
Hints: Julia Carolyn **** (née McWilliams; August 15, 1912 – August 13, 2004) was an American chef, author, and television personality.
The book recounts this person's life with her husband, Paul ****, in post-World War II France.
Following this success, this person wrote magazine articles and a regular column for The Boston Globe newspaper.
